name: part_007
file: tmp_【3Dお披露目】刮目せよ！吾輩の力を開放する時ッツ！！#ラプラス・ダークネス3D 【ラプラス・ダークネス⧸ホロライブ】 [V0Zk55CpFEM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: La+ reveals the 1 million yen prize was a lie, concluding the 'Hololive Spicy Championship' segment in the classroom.
Transition screen featuring La+ Darknesss' logo.
Back in the classroom, the members encourage La+ to finish her spicy food before she can go home.
La+ introduces the 'King's Game' segment with guests Sakamata Chloe, Shirogane Noel, Tokoyami Towa, and Momosuzu Nene.

subtitles.original: 誰が100万円なんて言った？
subtitles.english: Who said anything about 1 million yen?

subtitles.original: あんなのは嘘だ！
subtitles.english: That was a lie!

subtitles.original: 100万円なんて無ーいっ！！
subtitles.english: There's no such thing as 1 million yen!!

subtitles.original: ひっかかったー!!!
subtitles.english: You fell for it!!!

subtitles.original: ザコザコザコザコ... ばかー!!!!
subtitles.english: Weaklings, weaklings... Idiots!!!!

subtitles.original: 辛いもの食べただけだよお前らは！
subtitles.english: You guys just ate spicy food, that's all!

subtitles.original: いやでも美味しいもの食べさせてもらったってことかじゃあ
subtitles.english: Well, but I guess that means we got to eat something delicious then.

subtitles.original: ちょっと反応が違うなあ...
subtitles.english: The reaction is a bit different from what I expected...

subtitles.original: まあ、ラプラスさん出禁ですね！今日から
subtitles.english: Well, La+ is banned then! Starting today.

subtitles.original: なんで!?
subtitles.english: Why!?

subtitles.original: すいません、じゃあ出禁で！
subtitles.english: Excuse me, then you're banned!

subtitles.original: 私はラプラスに言わされてただけなので
subtitles.english: I was just made to say it by La+, so...

subtitles.original: 裏切るのか!!
subtitles.english: Are you betraying me!?

subtitles.original: 許してくださーい
subtitles.english: Please forgive me.

subtitles.original: じゃあルイさんしょうがないか！
subtitles.english: Then I guess Lui-san can't be helped!

subtitles.original: じゃあ100万円はあげないですけどバケモノっていう称号はあげます
subtitles.english: Then I won't give you 1 million yen, but I'll give you the title of "monster".

subtitles.original: バケモノ... うれしいのかな......
subtitles.english: Monster... I wonder if she's happy...

subtitles.original: 嬉しくないよ、やだよそんな称号...
subtitles.english: I'm not happy, I don't want a title like that...

subtitles.original: じゃあ激辛三姉妹で、頑張りましょうね
subtitles.english: Then let's do our best as the Three Spicy Sisters.

subtitles.original: なんかやりたいですね！
subtitles.english: I want to do something like that!

subtitles.original: がんばろ～
subtitles.english: Let's do our best~

subtitles.original: やってらんねーよ！こんなの！
subtitles.english: I can't take this anymore! Not this!

subtitles.original: それでは、以上ホロライブ激辛選手権でした～
subtitles.english: And that's it for the Hololive Spicy Championship~

subtitles.original: ばいばーい！
subtitles.english: Bye bye!

subtitles.original: 二度とやるかー！
subtitles.english: As if I'll ever do this again!

subtitles.original: ほら食べ終わんないと帰れないんですよ
subtitles.english: Look, you can't go home until you finish eating.

subtitles.original: 早く巻きでお願いします
subtitles.english: Hurry up, please speed it up.

subtitles.original: もう食べらんないよ...
subtitles.english: I can't eat anymore...

subtitles.original: 食べてください 頑張って
subtitles.english: Please eat. Good luck.

subtitles.original: じゃあ、あとは我々食べるとして、あと一口、あと最後の一口いっとこうか
subtitles.english: Then, the rest of us will eat... One more bite, let's go for that last bite.

subtitles.original: せーの
subtitles.english: Ready, set...

subtitles.original: いただきます
subtitles.english: Let's eat.

subtitles.original: うわああああ あああああ
subtitles.english: Uwaaaaaa aaaaaa

subtitles.original: しばらこ！なんだこれ！
subtitles.english: Shibarako! What is this!

subtitles.original: 返してやる！
subtitles.english: I'll give it back!

subtitles.original: 戻って帰ってそのまま！もうだめだ...
subtitles.english: Go back and just like that! I'm done...

subtitles.original: 女だらけの王様ゲーム～！
subtitles.english: The all-girl King's Game!

subtitles.original: はい！じゃあ自己紹介するぞ～
subtitles.english: Alright! Let's do self-introductions~

subtitles.original: 刮目せよ～！ラプラス・ダークネスでーすよろしくお願いします
subtitles.english: Behold~! I'm La+ Darknesss, nice to meet you.

subtitles.original: 適当だな～
subtitles.english: That was half-hearted~

subtitles.original: ばっくばっくば～ん どうも～！インターン シャチの沙花叉クロヱで～す
subtitles.english: Baku-baku-baaan! Hello! The intern orca, Sakamata Chloe here~

subtitles.original: 皆さんこんまっする～ ホロライブ3期生のん～脳筋！白銀ノエルです！
subtitles.english: Everyone, Kon-muscle~! From Hololive 3rd generation, the... muscle-brain! Shirogane Noel here!

subtitles.original: はーいこんやっぴー！ホロライブ4期生の常闇トワ様でーす！
subtitles.english: Hi, Kon-yappi! It's Hololive 4th generation's Tokoyami Towa-sama!

subtitles.original: 本物だ！もうこんな感じです...
subtitles.english: It's the real one! It's just like this...

subtitles.original: こんねね～ ホロライブ5期生 トワ様とラブラブな桃鈴ねねでーす！
subtitles.english: Kon-nene~! Hololive 5th generation, the one who's lovey-dovey with Towa-sama, Momosuzu Nene!

subtitles.original: ということでですね、今回この5人で王様ゲームやりたいと思いまーす
subtitles.english: So, I'd like to play the King's Game with these five people this time.

subtitles.original: なんで呼ばれたの～？ そう何でか分かんね～！
subtitles.english: Why was I called~? Yeah, I don't know why!

subtitles.original: まあ下心と～ 下心!? 下心と...
subtitles.english: Well, with an ulterior motive and... Ulterior motive!? With an ulterior motive and...

subtitles.original: ちょっとなんか面白いかな、と思うメンツを集めて王様ゲームやらせようと思って
subtitles.english: I gathered people who I thought might be interesting, and I'm going to make them play the King's Game.

subtitles.original: 王様ゲーム、やったことある人いますか？
subtitles.english: Has anyone played the King's Game before?

subtitles.original: やったことはないけど～ BL漫画でよく読んでるから詳しい
subtitles.english: I haven't done it, but I read about it a lot in BL manga so I'm well-versed.

subtitles.original: 知識だけはめっちゃある 欲望じゃねーか...
subtitles.english: I have tons of knowledge. Isn't that just desire...

subtitles.original: まあね、王様ゲーム 言ってる我輩やったことないんですけどね！
subtitles.english: Well, about the King's Game... actually, despite what I'm saying, I've never done it!

subtitles.original: ないの!? 今回、初体験王様ゲームなんでね
subtitles.english: You haven't!? This is my first time playing the King's Game, so...

subtitles.original: でもラプラス以外が王様引けば勝ちみたいなとこあるからね
subtitles.english: But if anyone other than La+ draws the King, it's basically a win.

subtitles.original: なんで！みんなで引きましょう！頑張って！
subtitles.english: Why! Let's all draw! Good luck!

subtitles.original: 王様になりたい！むしろ
subtitles.english: I want to be the King! If anything.

subtitles.original: 安全地帯に逃げる気ですね？
subtitles.english: You're planning to escape to the safe zone, aren't you?

subtitles.original: 我輩なりたい！王様なりたい！
subtitles.english: I want to be it! I want to be the King!

subtitles.original: やだ沙花叉もやりたいやりたいやりたいやりたい...
subtitles.english: No, Sakamata also wants to do it, wants to do it...

subtitles.original: 愛と欲望の紛れるこの王様ゲームを制するのは誰だ
subtitles.english: Who will rule this King's Game where love and desire mix?

subtitles.original: ねえいきなり始まる！ マジでやりたくね～
subtitles.english: Hey, it's starting all of a sudden! I really don't want to do this~

subtitles.original: おいおいおいおい！やるぞ～
subtitles.english: Hey, hey, hey, hey! Let's do it~

subtitles.original: せーの 王様だーれ！
subtitles.english: Ready, set... Who is the King!

subtitles.original: 王様誰ですか！ 王様は...
subtitles.english: Who is the King! The King is...

subtitles.original: ねねー!!
subtitles.english: Nene!!

subtitles.original: やばいやばい 怖い怖い ねね先輩か～
subtitles.english: This is bad, bad. Scary, scary. So it's Nene-senpai~

subtitles.original: じゃあ～ 2番の人が... ねね真ん中に立つから、ねねに... 愛の告白... してよね～！
subtitles.english: Then... number 2... since Nene will stand in the middle now, to Nene... a confession of love... do it!

subtitles.original: 自分が得しようとしてる！ じゃあちょっと2番の人手上げて...
subtitles.english: She's trying to benefit herself! Then, number 2, please raise your hand...

subtitles.original: はい我輩です!!
subtitles.english: Yes, it's me!!

subtitles.original: うわあああ!! ふざけんなよ～
subtitles.english: Uwaaaa!! You've got to be kidding me~

subtitles.original: え～愛の告白ぅ～？ じゃあ行きますよ...？
subtitles.english: Eh~ a love confession? Okay, here I go...?

subtitles.original: 辛いチキン食べたから息臭かったらごめん...
subtitles.english: I ate spicy chicken, so sorry if my breath stinks...
Counting down to the confession... 3... 2... 1...

subtitles.original: ねね、愛してるZE！
subtitles.english: Nene, I love you!

subtitles.original: 失笑やめて... 浅い！浅いなぁ～ 何かが違うなぁ～
subtitles.english: Stop laughing... Shallow! That's so shallow~ Something's not right~

subtitles.original: あ、まだやれますよ！
subtitles.english: Ah, I can still do it!

subtitles.original: 外野うるさいんだけど!! まだあります！ちょっと今の浅かった！
subtitles.english: The bystanders are being too noisy!! There's more! The one just now was shallow!

subtitles.original: ねねェ... 好きだよ...
subtitles.english: Nene... I like you...

subtitles.original: やめた方がいいよこれ～
subtitles.english: You should stop doing this~
